snippet: The former Florida governor laid out a campaign rationale and opened a fund-raising apparatus for a possible presidential campaign.
abstract: Former Florida Gov Jeb Bush begins wooing donors for 2016 presidential run and outlines major campaign themes, turning himself into most powerful figure within emerging Republican field; announces creation of political action committee Right to Rise; intends to emphasize big issues like immigration overhaul and income inequality.

byline.original: By MICHAEL BARBARO and NICHOLAS CONFESSORE

lead_paragraph: The former Florida governor laid out a campaign rationale and opened a fund-raising apparatus for a possible presidential campaign.

headline.main: Jeb Bush Begins Wooing Donors for a 2016 Bid
headline.print_headline: Jeb Bush Begins Wooing Donors for a 2016 Bid
